摷字的基本解释

摷
jiǎo
拘击。
动。
古同“剿”，断绝；灭绝。

摷
chāo
取；水中捞物。
古同“钞”。

摷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chāo］
［《集韻》初交切，平肴，初。］
(1)取；捞取。
(2)从侧面或较近的小路过去。
[②]［jiǎo］
［《集韻》子小切，上小，精。］
(1)击。
(2)通“剿”。断绝，灭绝。

摷字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摷； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页452第04
【唐韻】【集韻】?子小切，音勦。【說文】拘擊也。或作㩰。　又【唐韻】側交切【集韻】莊交切，?音罺。義同。　又【唐韻】落蕭切【集韻】憐蕭切，?音聊。義同。又動作也。　又【唐韻】【韻會】楚交切【集韻】初交切，?與鈔抄同。取也。【張衡·東京賦】摷昆聊。　又【集韻】郞刀切，音勞。義同。本从巢作摷。

摷字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
摷字的起名意思

暂无。

knock
Basic explanation of words
knock
jiǎo
Arrest.
move.
Gu Tong "suppresses", sever; extinct.
knock
chāo
Fetch;
Gu Tong "banknotes."
knock
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chāo]
["Ji Yun" first cross cut, flat food, early. ]
(1) Take; Take.
(2) Go from the side or a closer path.
[②]［jiǎo］
["Jiyun" sub-small cut, upper small, fine. ]
(1) Hit.
(2) Through "suppression". Extinct, extinct.
knock
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摷; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 452 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zi Xiaoqie, sound suppression. [Said Wen] Detention also. Or make 㩰.　[Tang Yun] side cross cut [Ji Yun] Zhuang cross cut,? Yin 罺. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] Luo Xiaoqie [Ji Yun] Pity Xiaoqie,? Voice chat. The same meaning. Also move.　[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Association] Chu cross-cutting [Jiyun] First cross-cutting,? Same as Chaochao. Take also. [Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu] Chat with Kunlun.　[Jiyun] Cut with a knife, sound labor. The same meaning. This book is made from the nest.
